subject: Re: Website Next Steps | Privatus Capital Partners
preview: Andy QA, management and feedback time.  (Time: 75mins)

full_threads.body:
Andy QA, management and feedback time.

(Time: 75mins)

Hi Allie,

Excellent - we have checked the website and it looks excellent so thank you for this.

Going forward, it is best if we keep changes in draft prior to confirmation to go live, as we the further changes are more creative decisions.

Following on from this, we would like to add a tombstone to the Advisory carousel on the home page.

The image would be of the logo of DBG Health and the text below will read as follows:

"Advised BDT&MSD on its investment in DBG Health"

Please find the website here for ease of reference, and also for embedding into the image: https://www.dbghealth.com.au/

It is imperative that this change is kept in draft form until otherwise notified. With the current timing we are working towards, we will likely let you know on Monday morning to go live with this change.

If we can please see the draft version at some point today to review, that would be really helpful.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Finlay,

Thank you so much for letting us know, and really glad the V2 updates are landing well with the team.

Just a quick heads-up:
  • The updated homepage is now live: https://privatuscp.com/
  • We've locked in Option C for the white box layout
  • We're pulling together a fresh round of image options now, focusing on more neutral, location landscapes and steering clear of anything too green-toned

And no problem at all on the Advisory carousel,just send through the details once you're happy with the copy, and we’ll make sure everything’s set to go live by Monday.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime, always happy to help.

Hi Allie,

Thanks again for the updates to the V2 Homepage and with the image samples - really appreciate how quick you've been with the turnaround!

Having discussed the Homepage v2 page with the team, we are happy for this to go live.

Regarding the white box variations on the sample page, we're happy with Option C. However, could we see some more alternative images? Appreciate I initially suggested options based on the Singapore and Sydney office locations, but would we be able to explore some more generic landscape images? Also important to note that the main feedback from the team is to avoid photos with too much green (as this gives off the impression that we are specialist impact investors). It would be great to see some sample options of this whenever you guys are able to action.

Finally, we will have an addition to the Advisory carousel on the home page which we would like to be on the website by Monday (as the deal is being announced on Sunday night). Once we have agreed on the language, I will provide you with the relevant information in order to give you as much time as possible to add this.

Thanks again for all your help on this, and please do not hesitate to call if anything requires clarification.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Finlay,

Happy Friday!

Just a quick heads-up, we’ve updated the advisory section on the homepage v2 to match the current background on the live site, as requested.

You can preview it here: https://privatuscp.com/homepage-v2/

Let us know if it’s all good on your end. Once we get the thumbs up, we’ll go ahead and make it live.

Thanks again, and feel free to reach out if anything else comes up. Always happy to help!

Hey Guys,

Thanks so much for this.

One change to make on the homepage v2: are you able to change the advisory section's background to what it currently is on the website? I have attached a screenshot below for reference.

If you can update this and send back across tomorrow morning, that would be much appreciated.



In terms of the different background images, we will discuss internally and revert back to you tomorrow morning.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

@allieB additional updates here communicated over phone.
https://www.loom.com/share/ba041cf8aee4424db0bb3b11dd6f6aba (0 to 2mins of the video)

  1. Update A$400m+ sizing
  2. Update background of investments section

Once done, this is approved for the homepage.

Secondly, we still need to come back to them with the design options for Specialists in Private Capital . I will create second ticket for this.

(Time: 45mins)

Hi Finlay,

Thank you so much for the feedback.

Just a quick heads-up that we’ve made the latest round of updates:

  • The homepage has been refreshed with your feedback - fonts, background colours, and carousel styling have all been adjusted.
    You can review it here:
    https://privatuscp.com/homepage-v2/

  • We’ve also added five variations of Option C for the “Specialist in Private Capital” section, each with a different background image from Sydney and Singapore to help move away from the green landscape focus:
    https://privatuscp.com/section-sample/

Feel free to share any thoughts once the team’s had a chance to take a look - we’re more than happy to make any tweaks or explore other image options if helpful.

Thanks again for the thoughtful feedback, really appreciate it as always.

Hi Finlay,

Thank you so much for the detailed feedback, really appreciate the clarity.

We’ve passed everything along to our dev team and they’re now working through the updates:

1. Homepage – Investments & Advisory Section
  • Font and sizing of “A$400m+” will be unified
  • “Our Investment” section will shift to a plain white background
  • The carousels for Privatus Capital Fund Investments and Princeville Global III ANZ Fund Co-Investments will return to the grey background as requested
  • We’ve taken note of the background colour reference

2. “Specialist in Private Capital” Section
  • We’ll prep another draft of Option C with alternative high-resolution imagery (less green landscape, more Sydney and Singapore-themed visuals)
  • This will be shared for your internal review before anything goes live


We’ll send through the updated version with you soon so you can review everything.

Let us know if anything changes in the meantime, always happy to help!

Hey Guys,

Thanks for this. Please see below for some feedback having discussed with the team.



  1. Homepage Investments and Advisory section


    1. Can we make sure that the "A$400m+" in the callout is all the same font and size?


    2. Can we change the 'Our Investment to just be a plain white background?


    3. And then can we have the Privatus Capital Fund Investments and Princeville Global III ANZ Fund Co-Investments carousels to have the slight grey background used prior?


    4. Please see below for the background colourway we are aiming for:





Once this has been complete, we are pleased with the design of these sections and therefore happy to go live with these changes.

    2. The white "Specialist in Private Capital section"


  1. The team really like the look of option C in the samples provided


  2. Would we be able to see these option with some different high resolution images in the background?


  3. The team are slightly concerned that our website currently exhibits too much green landscape in our imagery, lending viewers to view the firm as exclusively ESG investors. Therefore, it would be great to see option C with some other images (perhaps relating to Sydney and Singapore..?)



For action item 2, please send us another draft version of samples so we can discuss internally before executing live changes.

Thanks again for all your help.

Please feel free to get in touch if you need any clarifications with these edits.

Many thanks,

Finlay
Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Allie,

Thanks for this - let us discuss internally and revert back.

Appreciate the fast work with this again.

Many thanks,

Finlay

Finlay Campbell
Analyst


M +61 416 718 923
E zara@privatuscp.com

Hi Finlay,

Hope your day’s going well.

We’ve made a sample homepage based on your feedback:
  • Investments now follows Option A, with the light purple background and white lines kept as-is
  • Advisory uses Option C, set on a white background
  • The “Specialists in Private Capital” section has been moved up to reduce the gap

You can take a look here:
https://privatuscp.com/homepage-v2

For the “Specialists in Private Capital” section, we’ve put together three layout options:
https://privatuscp.com/section-sample/

Let us know which direction you’d prefer, or if there’s anything else you’d like to explore. Always happy to help.
one last QA before I send to client 🙏
